title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Educational Program for Soccer Tactical Training Using Small-Scale Conditional Games

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic soccer rules and match comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply tactical principles (spatial utilization and focus) for offense/defense based on varying pitch sizes with 80% accuracy.
Learners can employ three or more length/width adjustment strategies during team-based tactical execution through real-time coordination with peers.
Learners can interpret their tactical execution data with 90% reliability using digital analysis tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
